title: Roberts grants temporary stay after 19 states appeal to keep Title 42 in place
description: A group of 19 Republican-led states on Monday asked the Supreme Court to stop the immigration restriction Title 42 from ending this week

title: Jury reaches verdict in Harvey Weinstein sexual assault trial
description: Disgraced movie producer Harvey Weinstein was accused by four women of assaulting them in hotels between 2004 and 2013.

title: WATCH:  You have to watch this boy crush 'All I Want For Christmas Is You'
description: Jennifer White-Johnson and her husband Kevin Johnson Jr. knew their son Knox had a solo at his school's winter concert. They didn't know it would get even Mariah Carey's attention.

title: China reports 1st COVID deaths in weeks -- and experts say the toll may only rise
description: China reported its first COVID-19 deaths in weeks Monday, but experts say the number may only rise as the country experiences a surge of cases.

title: States appeal to Supreme Court to keep immigration limits
description: The Supreme Court is temporarily blocking an order that would lift pandemic-era restrictions on asylum seekers

title: WATCH:  Man builds a snack tower on pregnant woman's belly
description: John Adamczak decided to invent a new game when he stacked snack boxes on his pregnant niece's belly.

title: Jan. 6 committee makes criminal referrals: Key takeaways and what's next
description: The Jan. 6 committee ended its final meeting Monday by announcing multiple criminal referrals to the Department of Justice against former President Donald Trump.

title: Chicago high school students set to walk out of class over gun violence
description: Students at a Chicago high school are planning a classroom walkout Monday afternoon to protest gun violence just days after a shooting near their campus.

title: Jan. 6 committee condemns Trump as 'central cause' of insurrection in sweeping report
description: The Jan. 6 committee culminated its sweeping investigation by announcing it would make multiple criminal referrals to the DOJ against former President Trump.

title: Alcohol use blamed for death of Bengals analyst Adam Zimmer
description: Medical examiners say the death of Cincinnati Bengals analyst Adam Zimmer was caused by chronic alcohol use

title: Kansas City teacher fired after repeated use of racial slur
description: A white Kansas City charter school teacher has been fired after students recorded him using a racial slur several times

title: Proud Boys stand trial on Jan. 6 seditious conspiracy charges
description: Enrique Tarrio and Ethan Nordean, Joseph Biggs, Zachary Rehl and Dominic Pezzola all face at least nine counts each, including seditious conspiracy against the U.S.

title: FTX founder Sam Bankman-Fried does not waive extradition from Bahamas as expected
description: FTX founder Sam Bankman-Fried is facing charges of fraud and conspiracy in the U.S.

title: R. Kelly manager gets a year in prison for theater threat
description: R. Kelly’s onetime manager has been sentenced to a year in federal prison for calling in a shooting threat that halted a screening of a damning documentary about the R&B star

title: FBI issues alert on 'explosion' in child 'sextortion' schemes
description: With the holidays on the horizon, the FBI issued an alert on an "explosion" in child "sextortion" schemes.

title: 9 missing after boat capsizes off Florida coast
description: The U.S. Coast Guard is searching for nine people who were aboard a capsized boat off the coast of Florida.

title: Massachusetts court rules against medically assisted death
description: The highest court in Massachusetts has ruled that allowing doctors to prescribe a lethal dose of medication to mentally competent patients with terminal illnesses is not protected by the state constitution

title: WEB - LINK - BREAKING NEWS LIVE BLOG
Mother facing charges after allegedly cyberbullying her own daughter
description: A Michigan mom is facing charges, including stalking of a minor, for allegedly cyberbullying her daughter and other teenagers.

title: Has the Jan. 6 committee investigation changed American politics?
description: Has the Jan. 6 committee investigation changed American politics? "I think it would be a mistake to believe that the danger has passed," one expert told ABC News.

title: WATCH:  Lizards wrestle in Australia's Northern Territory
description: Two grappling sand goannas, a type of lizard, wrestled through an office in Australia's Northern Territory, tumbling out of the doorway and scurrying off.

title: WATCH:  Friends prank roommate by wrapping room in Christmas paper
description: A group of friends pulled a prank on their roommate who was away for the weekend by wrapping her room in Christmas gift wrap.

title: Amber Heard says she's settled Johnny Depp defamation case
description: Amber Heard announced Monday that she and her ex-husband, Johnny Depp, have settled their high-profile defamation case.

title: Epic Games agrees to pay $520 million over FTC investigation into Fortnite violations
description: Epic Games, the creator of Fortnite, agreed to pay about $520 million over allegations that it violated children's privacy, the Federal Trade Commission said on Monday.

title: Illinois set to become 1st state to eliminate cash bail
description: On Jan. 1, Illinois will become the first state in the nation to entirely eliminate cash bail amid high concern about crime.

title: EU accuses Meta of antitrust breaches with classified ads
description: The European Union has accused Facebook parent Meta of breaching the bloc’s antitrust rules by distorting competition in the online classified ads business

title: At Hanukkah reception, Biden to condemn rising antisemitism
description: President Joe Biden is condemning growing antisemitism in remarks for a Hanukkah reception at the White House that will include a menorah lighting and blessing

title: Russia, China to hold joint naval drills
description: Russian warships have set off to take part in a joint naval exercise with China, an exercise that showcases increasingly close defense ties between the two countries

title: Twitter users tell Elon Musk to step down in poll results
description: The Twitter CEO polled users Sunday night, saying he'll "abide by the results."

title: 5 killed, 1 injured in mass shooting near Toronto, police say
description: Five people are dead after a gunman opened fire at a condo building in a suburb near Toronto, police said.

title: US homeless numbers stay about the same as before pandemic
description: President Joe Biden's administration is making a new push to reduce homelessness as a federal survey confirms something that's obvious to people in many cities: The problem is not waning

title: What to expect from the Jan. 6 committee's final public meeting
description: The meeting, which will be the panel's tenth televised one this year, is scheduled to start at 1 p.m. Eastern.

title: Historic biodiversity agreement reached at U.N. conference
description: Negotiators reached a historic deal at a U.N. biodiversity conference late Sunday that would represent the most significant effort to protect the world’s lands and oceans and provide critical financing to save biodiversity in the developing world

title: Man to be sentenced in murders of 8 from another Ohio family
description: A man convicted in the killings of eight people from another southern Ohio family faces the possibility of life in prison without parole when he’s sentenced

title: 2 COVID-19 deaths reported in Beijing as virus surges
description: Chinese health authorities have reported the nation's first COVID-19 deaths in more than two weeks

title: Thai navy ship sinks, rescue underway for sailors in water
description: A Thai navy ship has sunk in the Gulf of Thailand and ships and helicopters are working to rescue sailors from the water

title: LA taps hotel rooms as estimated 40,000 people live homeless
description: Los Angeles Mayor Karen Bass told NBC's “Meet the Press” that her administration will start moving homeless people off streets and into motel rooms through a new program that launches Tuesday

title: Musk polls Twitter users about whether he should step down
description: He acknowledged he made a mistake in launching new speech restrictions.

title: North Korea says rocket launch was test of 1st spy satellite
description: Pyongyang calls launch a final-stage test for its first spy satellite,

title: WATCH:  Surviving boaters speak out on their harrowing story of survival
description: After being stranded and rescued from the sea, sailors Joe Ditomasso and Kevin Hyde tell their story of survival.

title: Dozens injured after severe turbulence on flight to Honolulu
description: Dozens of people were seriously injured after a Hawaiian Airlines flight en route to Honolulu experienced severe turbulence, according to officials.

title: What we've learned from the Jan. 6 committee hearings
description: The committee, in a dramatic moment to its next to last hearing, voted to subpoena Donald Trump.
